channel.title: 2006Redone - Developer Applications
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/lK1VF.png[/img]
[url=http://www.2006redone.org]Visit the Website[/url] [url=http://twitter.com/2006Redone]Visit our Twitter[/url] [url=http://youtube.com/2006redone]Visit our Youtube Channel[/url]
2006redone is a remake of the years of 2006. 2006redone will help you relive your childhood memories and get away from the terrible new content jagex has put in place of that.
[b][u]Programmers[/u][/b]: Myself. [b][u]Web Developers[/u][/b]: Dondxon [b][u]In need of[/u][/b]: Content Developers & Core Developers.
[b][u]Application[/u][/b]:
[b]To Apply[/b]: -You must have proof of work. -You must have msn. -You must be very knowledgeable in java or in web development depending on what you are applying for. -Have spare time to work on the server.
[b]Tos[/b]: -If I get access to the source I will NOT release the source to anyone. -If i get access to the source I will NOT release content in the source to anyone. -I will send a pm to Mr Extremez agreeing to the tos after applying on the thread so he has a picuture of you agreeing to the tos. -I agree to Tos check yes or no. Yes [] or No [].
[b]Application Format[/b]: [code]Msn/Skype: Proof of Work(links, projects, etc...): How many hours a day can you work?: Why should I consider you: Anything else?: Do you accept Tos?(Auto decline if not): [/code]
For more info please check out our project thread: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,589557.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,589557.0.html[/url]
Thanks, Mr Extremez :D[/center]

item.title: 2006Redone - Developer Applications
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:15, topic:472076”]Hi there, I am applying for a content developer position, although I am very fluent in Java, I’m not very familiar with the protocol of RS2. A large majority of my RSPS experience is with Runescape Classic (not all of it is though!). I like the 317-377 era of RS2 and wish to get more involved in the scene, although when I do say ‘scene’ I don’t mean poorly programmed servers (unlike most sources I’ve seen).

Msn/Skype: msn, i-need-fire@hotmail.com

Proof of Work(links, projects, etc…):

[ul][li]RSC Map Generator[/li]
[li]Jagex Cache Editing API[list]
[li]Example[/li]
[/list][/li]
[li]ExoClient - An external RSC Client Loader[/li]
[li]Native RSC Graphics rendering in C++[/li]
[li]RSC Client font issue fix[/li]
[li]Updated RSC Report Abuse Screen[list]
[li]Used on RSCEmulation[/li]
[/list][/li]
[li]Server Stress tester[/li]
[li]RSC Game engine editing[/li]
[li]More stable game engine[/li]
[li]RSC Bank Pin[/li]
[li]Small showoff update[/li]
[li]RSC Party chest[/li]
[li]Developer for RSCEmulation (when luke ran it)[/li]
[li]Developer for ProjectRSC (until recently)[/li]
[li]Loads more that i haven’t posted on mopar…[/li][/ul]

How many hours a day can you work?: 4+ everyday, yes I’m a nerd

Why should I consider you: Because I have a good eye for replication, of which it appears you are doing. All the content I have developed for RSC is really spot on, and accurate. Plus, I want to get more familiar with RS2’s game engine (slowly).

Anything else: My code is organized and neat. I follow all of Java’s conventions, and I use the latest Java techniques.
Edit: I’m also fluent in MANY other languages.

Lastly: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d1RcRglBaHA

Do you accept Tos?(Auto decline if not): Of course.[/quote]Highly considering you, would anyone vouch for you saying that you are good programmer?

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone - Developer Applications
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:6, topic:472076”]I am applying for core or content developer; whichever you feel you need the most help in.

Msn/Skype: lazerbike@hotmail.com
Proof of Work(links, projects, etc…):
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,556345.msg4072638.html#msg4072638
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,528690.msg3855939.html#msg3855939
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,532928.msg3895321.html#msg3895321
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537223.msg3927928.html#msg3927928
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,556470.msg4073529.html#msg4073529
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540399.msg3957452.html#msg3957452

How many hours a day can you work?: I just finished my exams for this semester in college, so I am able to work more than six hours a day, depending on the occasion.

Why should I consider you: I am a very hard worker, I will not stop once I receive a task/project, I work very well with others, and I will not fool around. Even though I have stopped programming for quite some time, I have come back guns loaded with more knowledge than ever. I am very open-minded, and I take criticism very well now. If I were to receive core developer, then I will brainstorm all the pros and cons of whatever changes that I make to the core and attempt to make an intelligent decision after doing research too; same goes for content developer.

Anything else?: I would like to be payed in USD when you have enough money left over after supporting the server/website.

Do you accept Tos?(Auto decline if not): Yes, I accept the TOS.[/quote]Accepted, about usd after we get donations I think we can make that work.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone - Developer Applications
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:472130”]Applying because I’m bored.

Skype: “Lolcats”

Proof of Work: All of the following Links are to easy and simple work. I can show you much more advanced content via Skype.

Example of simple Server-Sided Debug lines for Packets

Client-Sided Debugging Command

Deliverance Staff System

289 Prayer Tab look-a-like

Public Concepts Thread

Public Skilling Concepts

How many hours a day can you work? 4-18 hours per day. I’m 20 years old with a very flexible schedule.

Why should I consider you: It should be obvious unless you’ve been under a rock for a while. We’re Team_Rocket. I’m not going to write out something long like I should. Instead, why don’t you just ask around the community about us.

Anything else? I’d need to be compensated on commission with currency (U.S.D); no virtual goods or items.

Do you accept Tos?: Your Terms of Service agreement is cute, but unfortunately useless.[/quote]Declined. I honestly don’t think we have the funds to pay you in usd atm sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: 2006Redone - Developer Applications
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:2, topic:472076”]For if and or when you’re accepting website developers applications:

MSN: ruby@prothieum.org
Skype:Ruby_Website_Developer

Proof of Work(links, projects, etc…):
Probably the most relevant: RCS, your current website software.
Dynamic content tutorial.
Database manipulation for beginners
Security tutorial
Introduction to MySQLi
SSI Integrated template
In-depth loops for beginners
In-depth arrays for beginners

The list goes on further :rolleyes:. If you need any more, you can ask.

How many hours a day can you work?:
Monday-Wednesday: 2 hours.
Thursday, Friday, Sunday: 4 hours.
Saturday: 0-1 hours.

Why should I consider you:
Since I played a key part and have extensive experience in the creation of the website software you’re using means I’m ideal for the position if it were to come around. I’ve been looking for a remake that’s going somewhere for quite some time now and after the demise of Evelus I have plenty of time. I’m a key player when it comes to teamwork considering every day in life I must work in dangerous situations in a team while under serious stress. I’ve played RuneScape since 2004 and my “prime” of RuneScape was the 2005-2007 era putting 2006 slap bang in the middle; those were the days nostalgia. Alongside working in a team under stressful conditions and dangerous situations I also coach muay thai and MMA at a local gym, this puts me in a position where I must be a leader and be able to control and keep a team focused at all times. I’m in no way saying I should be leading this project I’m just stating that I have extensive experience in being a team player as well as the team leader, team working is a strong point of mines. If you wish to know anything else then feel free to ask me here or message me.

Anything else?:
I’m on GMT timezone and am available Monday-Wednesday anytime after 5pm, Thursday, Friday and Sunday all day and all night except friday, I’m available until 7pm. I’m not really free on a Saturday as I use that as a chill and get drunk day. However, any time I’ve stated I’m usually free to do work. If you need to get in contact with me when I’m out there’s several ways I can give you the means to do that.

Do you accept Tos?(Auto decline if not):
Yes, 100%.[/quote]Accepted ruby thanks for applying I’m sure you could help out my website developer, I’ll contact him and private message you.

Read full topic
